ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
des: "This is a basic recipe and stands alone for chicken - go from there to add your own seasonings for steak, pork, etc.  I put beer in just about every marinade."
ins:
In a mixing bowl, combine beer, garlic, parsley, and soy sauce.
Marinate meat in the mixture for a few hours to overnight; cover and refrigerate meat while marinating. Cook as desired.
